Keywords: Brute , Celebrity , Monster , Mystical , Teen Titans
Real Name: Rachel Roth
Special Powers
RALLY (6): Opposing Attack Rolls . FREE: Remove two of Red Raven's RALLY dice. If you do, this game, she has Steal Energy, Colossal damage symbol, and Cosmic Energy team ability.
TELL US HOW YOU REALLY FEEL, RAVEN: SIDELINE ACTIVE - When a friendly character of 40 points or more with the Teen Titans keyword is KO'd, after resolutions you may generate Red Raven from your Sideline on click #4 in that character's square. If the KO'd character was named Raven, you may generate Red Raven on click #1 instead.
SMACH: Charge, Flurry.
